title: SR Suntour Auron trail fork gets EQ air spring upgrade for smoother, quieter squish
content:
The 2021 SR Suntour Auron takes their top-of-the-line mountain bike trail fork and adds their Air EQ system to automatically balance positive and negative air chambers.
